author: ate
msg: Fix translating @PLATFORM@ variable in OJB repository_database.xml configuration for tests.
TestCapability failed with Hsqldb because OJB didn't take hsqldb specific sql syntax into account because of this.
This @PLATFORM@ property should not be overlooked!

author: ate
msg: Restore test database properties, which were somehow replaced by hardcoded database properties.
For tests run from within subprojects, the hardcoded properties won't do but must be set with the
test database properties (root maven.xml dbSetup goal).
Now (db dependant) testcases can again be run from subfolders directly.

author: weaver
msg: contains all of the logic required to initalize Spring for use within test cases.

author: jgenender
msg: Fixed classloader issues by implementing delegation and fixed a URL for the EJB context
